meanings: type of dramatic recitation accompanied by a shamisen (associated with Japanese puppet theater)
mall blue passerine bird (esp. the blue-and-white flycatcher and the Siberian blue robin, but also the red-flanked bluetail)

readings: にんぎょうじょうるり
meanings: Japanese puppet theatre in which recited narrative and dialog is accompanied by a shamisen (forerunner of bunraku)
